description.value:
School enchantment (compulsion) [mind-affecting]; Level psychic 2; Bloodline Psychic 2;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components S

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Targets one creature
Duration concentration + 1 round
Saving Throw Will negates; Spell Resistance yes

Description

By invading the mind of a creature with your psychic presence, you can isolate parts of its mind, preventing the target from functioning in a coherent manner. The target is confused as long as you concentrate on it plus 1 additional round. A successful Will save negates this effect.

data.shortDescription: By invading the mind of a creature with your psychic presence, you can isolate parts of its mind, preventing the target from functioning in a coherent manner. The target is confused as long as you concentrate on it plus 1 additional round. A successful Will save negates this effect.
